thread.title: So glad we chose this hotel!
thread.title_full: So glad we chose this hotel! - Review of Roger Smith Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Lois N
title: So glad we chose this hotel!
text:
This hotel in midtown Manhattan near Grand Central Station was everything we hoped it would be! It is clean, quiet, roomy, comfortable and staffed by the most courteous people! We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would highly recommend it to anyone. It is a charming older hotel which is very well-maintained. Close to everything you could possibly need or want in New York. Many thanks to the staff who made us feel welcome!
Tip - wear comfortable shoes to NYC because you will be doing a lot of walking! Or, opt for a yellow cab - they are plentiful and do not cost a lot of money.
